New Records: Lockie Ferguson bowled four maidens to return the format's most economical figures, taking 3/0 against Papua New Guinea
Miscellaneous Highlights: Both teams were playing their final match at the tournament after missing out on qualification from Group C
Others: Trent Boult played possibly for the last time for New Zealand
Papua New Guinea captain Assad Vala was dismissed for 6 (16) by Lockie Ferguson
